short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync data from accountant-ai to tally

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension's single purpose is to synchronize financial data between the accountant-ai platform and Tally accounting software. It acts as a secure bridge, fetching data from accountant-ai and formatting it appropriately for Tally, streamlining the data transfer process for users who utilize both platforms.
